Package free.workarounds

Contains backward compatible replacements for various JDK classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
FixedJComboBox A fix of JComboBox.
FixedJInternalFrame A fix of JInternalFrame.
FixedJPanel A fix for JPanel.
FixedJPasswordField A fix of JPasswordField.
FixedJTable A fix for JTable.
FixedJTextArea A fix of JTextArea.
FixedJTextField A fix of JTextField.
FixedTableColumn A fix for TableColumn.
FixUtils A class containing various utilities allowing to work around various bugs in Java.
SwingFix A class which statically applies various fixes/workarounds for swing.
 

Package free.workarounds Description

Contains backward compatible replacements for various JDK classes. The replacements fix various JDK bugs.
